text:
First time eating at this foodcourt cause itâ€™s rather unpopulated and the stalls are rather few compared to the one above.

Walked past the economic rice store and decided to try it after seeing the never ending customers and variety of dishes(will take pic next time)

Also they offer brown rice!! Which i rarely see in mixed veg rice stores.

Anyways, the price is insanely cheap, I got:
Brown rice(less) + tofu with meat on top + bean sprouts with tofu + pumpkin + steamed egg + sweet and sour pork with ah-zha + beancurd skin + hairy gourd = $8.60!!

I was damn surprised when I heard the price, and the portion they give is pretty huge. Would certainly patronise the store again.

Take note: they only accept cash!!
Mix rice stall charge reasonably. I had liver, steam egg, eggplant wit meat and rice. It cos me only $4. The dishes are all delicious.

Bought this you tiao from the chinese snack stall.
The you tiao taste tough n cold like overnight leftovers.
How to be happy when they have the cheek to sell this kind of food.
Not about the $2 but just the kinda of integrity as a hawker.

This one person selling the drink trying to cheat money when to brought a drink and it came with the ice but didn't give ice as I thought okay I go back to put my stuff first as a lot people so maybe they forget about it but when I go back I told this guys that I brought a drink not long ago but you didn't give ice he say ok but when I going to take the ice from him he say have to pay first for the ice then I was like what then I say it's okay as first time I heard the coffee shop got charge the ice for money when you buy the drink it should come with the ice if I wanna extra ice I know I will need to pay but I just ask for the ice that you guys didn't give and the guys like I own him big money small money this coffee shop also wanna to cheat money what a day
The drink store had good service. Bought a cup of ice for $0.40. Staff was nice despite the absurd order ðŸ’¯
